main event: Multiple UFO sightings and photographs reported in Cincinnati, Ohio and Batavia, Ohio on October 14, 1956.
interesting points: Photographs and negatives were provided by two reliable citizens to a military official for investigation.
A bright, metallic-looking object trailed by flame-like structure was observed traveling at high speed before making a sharp turn and disappearing from sight.
The witnesses reported that the object did not leave a trail when turning, suggesting it was a smooth and continuous turn unlike that of a jet.
Another sighting described a stationary object that suddenly shot away at a terrific speed after being still for about a minute.
The report includes references to an international crisis and a request for confidentiality.
sighted object: bright, metallic-looking object trailed by flame-like structure
photographs: yes, photographs and negatives were provided for investigation
